name: Ria Action Adventure
summary: Ria is a mythology-based action-adventure open world overrun by monstrous dark creatures. God has sent his son (Ria) to save humanity and clean it for the first civilization of humans on earth. You’ll set out alone to face down hordes of deadly enemies and epic bosses, and try to prevent the dark souls from summoning the queen of Dark-Soul. If she is awaken , the world will suffer endless time of darkness. It's going to take everything you've got to stop the queen of dark soul from being awaken.
